item.description:
This is going to be the first meetup of this group in a while.

It will be good to:
-Introduce ourselves
-Discuss our blogging experiences
-Discuss our expectations for this group

I imagine there are members here that run the gamut of experience when it comes to blogging. All are welcome and all will be heard.

group.name: The Greater Boston Area Weblogger Meetup Group

item.name: First Meetup of the Summer
